body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/28690).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28686](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28686) (refactor: Split per-peer parts of net module into new node/connection module by ajtowns)
* [#28676](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28676) ([WIP] Cluster mempool implementation by sdaftuar)
* [#28649](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28649) (Do the SOCKS5 handshake reliably by vasild)
* [#28549](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28549) (build: Move `message.{h,cpp}` from `libbitcoin_util` to `libbitcoin_common` by hebasto)
* [#28530](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28530) (tests, bug fix: DisconnectedBlockTransactions rewrite followups by ismaelsadeeq)
* [#28311](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28311) ([WIP] BIP300 (Drivechains) consensus-level logic by luke-jr)
* [#28075](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28075) (util: Remove DirIsWritable, GetUniquePath by maflcko)
* [#28051](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28051) (Get rid of shutdown.cpp/shutdown.h, use SignalInterrupt directly by ryanofsky)
* [#27581](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27581) (net: Continuous ASMap health check by fjahr)
* [#27351](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27351) (wallet: add `seeds` argument to `importdescriptors` by apoelstra)
* [#27331](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27331) (refactor: extract CCheckQueue's data handling into a separate container "Bag" by martinus)
* [#26812](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26812) (test: add end-to-end tests for CConnman and PeerManager by vasild)
* [#26711](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26711) (validate package transactions with their in-package ancestor sets by glozow)
* [#25665](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25665) (refactor: Add util::Result failure values, multiple error and warning messages by ryanofsky)
* [#23352](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23352) (test: Extend stale_tip_peer_management test by maflcko)
* [#22838](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22838) (descriptors: Be able to specify change and receiving in a single descriptor string by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
